overview: He is Doctor in Law by Complutense University of Madrid (UCM), he obtained an extraordinary mention in both degrees. External legal adviser of the Person, Family and House of his Majesty The King Mr. Juan Carlos I. He is also lecturer of juridical, moral and political Philosophy in the faculty of Law of the UCM (17-8-1984), where he is lecturer since December 1975. As President of Romero Moreno Abogados, S.L.
